entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student in Potions class. He is described as hurrying off towards the store cupboard to find ingredients.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A classmate of Harry's who is also working on a potion. He is described as cutting up valerian roots quickly.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another classmate of Harry's who seems to be progressing well in the potion-making task. Her potion is already resembling the ideal halfway stage.

relationships.description: Harry hurried off towards the store cupboard to find what he needed for his potion.
Malfoy was cutting up valerian roots as fast as he could.
Harry bent low over his book again to continue working on his potion.
Hermione seemed to have progressed furthest in the potion-making task, with her potion resembling the ideal halfway stage.
